messages.content: ComfyUI-ComfyWorkflows is an extension that provides the best way to run, share, & discover thousands of ComfyUI workflows.
You can find ComfyUI-ComfyWorkflows at the official website: [https://comfyworkflows.com](https://comfyworkflows.com).
How can I join the ComfyUI-ComfyWorkflows Discord community for support?
You can join the ComfyUI-ComfyWorkflows Discord community through this server invite link: [https://discord.gg/kXS43yTRNA](https://discord.gg/kXS43yTRNA).
What is the installation process for ComfyUI-ComfyWorkflows?

To install ComfyUI-ComfyWorkflows, you need to navigate to the `custom_nodes` folder in your ComfyUI installation, clone the repository from GitHub, change into the new directory, and install the requirements using `python -m pip install -r requirements.txt`. Finally, restart ComfyUI.
How can I deploy my workflow online using ComfyUI-ComfyWorkflows?

To deploy your workflow online, you need to create a free account on [https://comfyworkflows.com](https://comfyworkflows.com), share your workflow there, enable cloud workflow, open your workflow in local ComfyUI, and upload it using the 'Upload to ComfyWorkflows' button.
What upcoming features are planned for ComfyUI-ComfyWorkflows?
Planned features include the ability to import any workflow from ComfyWorkflows with zero setup and backup private local workflows to the cloud.
